short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Goes through a sequence of websites with the click of a button.  Especially useful for the webcomic addict.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify following all your favorite websites and never miss an update again!  WebsiteSequence lets users specify different sequences of websites they wish to go through at a time, along with the days they would like to visit each website.  Once a sequence has been created, the user is able to select the sequence they wish to go through and go from website to website by simply clicking on the browser action button (orange arrow to the right of the address bar).  Multiple sequences can be created.  

A dark theme is included.
